monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Player can ride the Monster - Breaks hidden walls - Destroys diamond blocks
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: For every different type of Debuff on an enemy Monster, it deals 2.5% less damage and takes 2.5% more damage.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Armor Shred
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Burning Charge
skills.description: 1 x 125% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Burning Charge Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Burning Charge Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Burning Charge Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Burning Desire
skills.description: Unique Aura: Apply Shield to the party when an enemy receives Burn (Debuff) damage equal to 4% of each Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Charged Destruction
skills.description: Aura: For every 12 Charge stacks spent by an ally, it applies Burn, Weakness or Armor Break to a random enemy.

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Cooling
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Chill.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Focus
skills.description: Critical Damage values from equipment increased by 50%.

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Exploit
skills.description: Attacks that exploit an enemy's weakness have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Debuff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Debuff Variety
skills.description: Aura: For every different type of Debuff on an enemy Monster, it deals 2.5% less damage and takes 2.5% more damage.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Fiery Stabs
skills.description: 4 x 35% (140%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 85% (425%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Full Protect
skills.description: Redirects the next attack targeting each ally to this Monster. Shield self for 4 x (150 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Full Protect Lvl 2
skills.description: Redirects the next attack targeting each ally to this Monster. Shield self for 5 x (175 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Full Protect Lvl 3
skills.description: Redirects the next attack targeting each ally to this Monster. Shield self for 6 x (200 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Ice Spear Volley
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Spear Volley Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Icy Shots
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Icy Shots Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Icy Shots Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Icy Shots Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Icy Shots Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +45%

skills.name: Impale
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (earth) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Impale Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (earth) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Impale Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (earth) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Impale Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) physical damage (earth) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Impale Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (earth) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Kindle
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Lava Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (200 + 20% Defense + 20% Attack) Applies Armor Break (Debuff) to a random enemy

skills.name: Lava Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (300 + 25% Defense + 25% Attack) Applies Armor Break (Debuff) to 2 random enemies

skills.name: Lightning Assault
skills.description: 2 x 90% (180%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Assault Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash
skills.description: 2 x 85% (170%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 115% (230%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Load Up
skills.description: Shield actions apply 1 Charge stack per shield. Passive shields have a 20% chance to apply 1 Charge stack.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 21. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mega Protect
skills.description: Redirects the next attack targeting each ally to this Monster. Shield all for 3 x (250 + 30% Defense)

skills.name: Meteorite Shower
skills.description: 2 x 175% (350%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies Shield all allies for 1 x (700 + 150% Attack)

skills.name: Predation
skills.description: When this Monster spends a turn without attacking, it gains a Predation stack.

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Reckless Mending
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an ally applies Armor Break or Chill, it regains 3% of Max Health and Max Mana.

skills.name: Revenge
skills.description: Every time this Monster takes a hit, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Shatter
skills.description: Unique Aura: Chill causes attacks against enemies affected by it to have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Skirmish
skills.description: Aura: When allied Beasts or Reptiles spend a turn without attacking, apply Bleed on enemies equal to 5% of their current Health. (2% vs. Champions, Infinity Arena)

skills.name: Splatter
skills.description: Aura: When an enemy is knocked out, spread half of their Bleed stacks to the remaining enemies. (rounded up)

skills.name: Tectonic Spikes
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Weakening Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (200 + 20% Defense + 20% Attack) Applies Weakness (Debuff) to a random enemy

skills.name: Weakening Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (300 + 25% Defense + 25% Attack) Applies Weakness (Debuff) to 2 random enemies

skills.name: Wind Weakness
skills.description: Wind damage increased by 50%
